sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)

Process was termintating before console's init() was called meaning we would never receive the 
terminate debug event and never close the streams.

Changes:
ProcessConsole - init handles terminated processes
RuntimeProcess - synchronized access to the fTerminated flag.

traces.message: Line tracker did not receive close notification
